title: Building Memory for Writing
excerpt: I built a RAG system to query my own writing. What started as a weekend experiment became a mirror for understanding my own voice.

title: A Life in Gigabytes
excerpt: After my estranged father died, I built an AI 'dad' from gigabytes of his documents. It didn't just answer questions—it gave me a second chance.

title: Post Determinism
excerpt: AI is reshaping software from deterministic code to probabilistic systems. The future lies in blending logic with learning to build trustworthy tools.

title: When Exit Strategy Trumps Excellence
excerpt: Arc's death for a $610M exit perfectly captures Silicon Valley's disease: building for acquisitions, not users.

title: Introducing Prose
excerpt: Frustrated with bloated Markdown editors, I built Prose—a clean, distraction-free writing app that respects focus, typography, and simplicity.

title: AI Is Not a Feature
excerpt: Why adding a chatbot isn't enough—and what building for an AI-native future really means.

title: Design Diaries: The Flow of GrindLab
excerpt: Thoughtful UI design should transform complex workflow into a simple, frictionless user journey.

title: Design Diaries: Optimization
excerpt: Learning to respect mobile constraints. Optimization in GrindLab wasn't about brute force—it was about learning when to do less, smarter.

title: Design Diaries: Start Your Engines
excerpt: A strong foundation is what turns ideas into tools people trust. Ask yourself: what is the one thing this product absolutely has to get right? Start there. Build around that.

title: Design Diaries: Introducing GrindLab
excerpt: The start of a journey building GrindLab, an iOS app that uses computer vision to analyze coffee grind particles through the iPhone camera.

title: Meet Synthra
excerpt: What should AI-first frameworks look like? Meet Synthra.

title: Voyage Context 3: The Future of RAG?
excerpt: With Voyage's new voyage-context-3 model, developers can simplify their pipelines while improving answer quality across complex documents.

title: The Path to Profitability
excerpt: The next trillion-dollar tech company won't be built by creating the best AI model—it will be built by controlling how, where, and why people use AI.

title: Apple is Missing the AI Race
excerpt: Apple is failing to implement artificial intelligence in a way that plays to their greatest strengths.

title: Beyond the Chatbot
excerpt: AI-first products demand a different approach. It's not just about embedding a model...
